solution_line_template: Ziggy gets {total_requests} / {electropop_divisor} = <<{total_requests}/{electropop_divisor}={electropop_requests}>>{electropop_requests} electropop song requests every night.
There are {electropop_requests} / {dance_divisor} = <<{electropop_requests}/{dance_divisor}={dance_requests}>>{dance_requests} dance song requests every night.
There are {rock_music_requests} - {oldies_less_than_rock} = <<{rock_music_requests}-{oldies_less_than_rock}={oldies_requests}>>{oldies_requests} oldies requests every night.
Ziggy plays DJ's choice {oldies_requests} / {dj_choice_divisor} = <<{oldies_requests}/{dj_choice_divisor}={dj_choice_requests}>>{dj_choice_requests} time every night.

Thus, Ziggy gets {total_requests} - {electropop_requests} - {dance_requests} - {rock_music_requests} - {oldies_requests} - {dj_choice_requests} = <<{total_requests}-{electropop_requests}-{dance_requests}-{rock_music_requests}-{oldies_requests}-{dj_choice_requests}={rap_songs_requested}>>{rap_songs_requested} rap songs requested every night.
